name: MTLArgument
desc: Information about an argument of a graphics or compute function.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the compiled function uses the argument.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: The index in the argument table that corresponds to the function argument.

items.name: var access: MTLArgumentAccess
items.desc: The argument's read and/or write access.

items.name: var bufferAlignment: Int
items.desc: The required byte alignment in memory for the buffer data.

items.name: var bufferDataSize: Int
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the buffer data.

items.name: var bufferDataType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of the buffer data.

items.name: var bufferStructType: MTLStructType?
items.desc: A description of the structure data of a buffer argument.

items.name: var bufferPointerType: MTLPointerType?
items.desc: A description of the pointer to a buffer argument.

items.name: var textureDataType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of a texture argument.

items.name: var textureType: MTLTextureType
items.desc: The texture type of a texture argument.

items.name: var isDepthTexture: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the texture is a depth texture.

items.name: var arrayLength: Int
items.desc: The number of elements, if the argument is an array.

items.name: var threadgroupMemoryAlignment: Int
items.desc: The required byte alignment in memory for the threadgroup data.

items.name: var threadgroupMemoryDataSize: Int
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the threadgroup data.
